version_description:
Store Names are now included in the Transaction History Page
App tutorials across all pages have been revamped
Receipt submission functionality has been added to every app page
Submitted receipts now appear as ‘processing on Transaction History Page
Assistant section of the app and all FAQs have been updated
Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

Store Names are now included in the Transaction History Page
App tutorials across all pages have been revamped
Receipt submission functionality has been added to every app page
Submitted receipts now appear as ‘processing on Transaction History Page
Assistant section of the app and all FAQs have been updated
Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

Store Names are now included in the Transaction History Page

Store Names are now included in the Transaction History Page
App tutorials across all pages have been revamped
Receipt submission functionality has been added to every app page
Submitted receipts now appear as ‘processing on Transaction History Page
Assistant section of the app and all FAQs have been updated
Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

Introduction of Carrefour section on the offers page
New hyperlink on all offers with details on participating locations
Version control and automated alerts for new app releases
Enhanced voice results to display store information and link to maps
New messaging on main page about member benefits
Updated programme terms and conditions to include Carrefour

Added security step of card validation for unverified cards in the SHARE Wallet
Enhancement of the SHARE profile section to include nationality
Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

Bug fixes and minor improvements
Bug fixes and minor improvements
Bug fixes and minor improvements

• Enhanced Offer Display on the SHARE app
• New view of Carrefour offers from the homepage
• Device and version control to enable automated alerts for new app releases
• Updated terms and conditions pertaining to each offer
• Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

- Added security measure for the SHARE Wallet
- Easier and secure app sign in using biometrics
- New area for online shopping brand sites
- An "Updates" section for regular programme news
- Enhanced "Support" section most notably the Email Us/Contact Us features
- New rich push and in-app notification functionality

Enhanced sign-in experience with biometric capabilities
Revamped app interface including homepage, offers page and account page
Transformation of ‘Offers’ page to ‘Experiences’ with new contest and member benefit sections
Streamlined SHARE homepage with key member actions (scan receipt, SHARE ID) brought to the forefront
Updated Accounts page with a new dedicated section for scanned receipts (processed, approved and declined)
Full refresh of all app content including tutorials, images and more
Ongoing user enhancements and bug fixes

1. Introduction of new functionality to gather member feedback
2. Release of an app plugin to gauge app ratings and gather reviews
3. Launch of a limited time SHARE Wishes section supporting charity
4. Introduction of new app analytics on the app backend
5. Ongoing user enhancements and stability-related fixes

Thank you for using the SHARE app!
We’ve added a paramount feature - SHARE app is now available on your Apple smart watch for easy access, giving you enhanced mobility. You can now retrieve the following on the go;
1. Points balance
2. SHARE ID
3. Account Transactions List

Thank you for using the SHARE app!
In this update, we have disabled the SHARE Wallet as we are currently working on a new and improved feature that will be rolled out later this year. As always, we continue to made tweaks and smashed bugs to make your experience on our SHARE app even better.
